meanings.definition: A person who spins information in a favorable light.
meanings.sent1: The spinmeister at the company always makes the news sound positive.
meanings.sent2: The politician was known as the spinmeister for his ability to twist facts favorably.
meanings.sent3: The spinmeister's job is to make even bad news seem good.
meanings.sent4: She was a true spinmeister, turning any situation into a positive story.
meanings.sent5: The spinmeister's talent lies in making everything shine brightly.

meanings.definition: To spin information in a favorable light.
meanings.sent1: He would spinmeister the facts to make his actions seem justified.
meanings.sent2: She always spinmeisters her achievements to impress her boss.
meanings.sent3: The way he spinmeisters his mistakes is truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: The company tried to spinmeister the product's failure as a success.
meanings.sent5: She can spinmeister any story to make it sound positive.
